title: HTML Document Structure
content: Learn how to create the basic structure of an HTML document including doctype, html, head, and body elements. Understanding semantic HTML and proper document organization is crucial for web development.

title: HTML Elements and Attributes
content: Explore common HTML elements like headings, paragraphs, links, images, and lists. Learn about element attributes and how they modify element behavior and appearance.

title: CSS Selectors and Properties
content: Master different types of CSS selectors including element, class, ID, and advanced selectors. Learn essential CSS properties for styling text, colors, and spacing.

title: Python Variables and Data Types
content: Introduction to Python programming fundamentals including variables, strings, numbers, lists, and dictionaries. Essential concepts for data science applications.

title: Understanding User Needs
content: Learn techniques for conducting user research, creating personas, and understanding user pain points through empathy mapping and user interviews.
